creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Based on the magical themed middle world, "KingDom Guard" reveals a war between the Magic and the Sword. You can train your soldiers to defend the enemy so as to protect your homeland. Deploy your soldiers to attack and eliminate the Invaders to become the mighty leader in this world!

1. Groundbreaking Gameplay
A new way of growing to get rid of the boring buttons for upgrading. Instead, soldiers are absolutely under your control of promotion! Two soldiers of the same levels and types can be used to promote more advanced ones!

2. Strategic Tower Defense
Defense can be arranged based on the different features of soldiers to defend the enemy. Different defense formation always gives you surprises.

Let your name engraved on this brutal continent! Become the ultimate king of this new era!
descriptionShort: Win the throne in this continent! Join us to conquer the nations as a King!

A new way of growing to get rid of the boring buttons for upgrading. Instead, soldiers are absolutely under your control of promotion! Two soldiers of the same levels and types can be used to promote more advanced ones!

2. Strategic Tower Defense
Defense can be arranged based on the different features of soldiers to defend the enemy. Different defense formation always gives you surprises.

Let your name engraved on this brutal continent! Become the ultimate king of this new era!
descriptionShort: Win the throne in this continent! Join us to conquer the nations as a King!

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Based on the magical themed middle world, "KingDom Guard" reveals a war between the Magic and the Sword. You can train your soldiers to defend the enemy so as to protect your homeland. Deploy your soldiers to attack and eliminate the Invaders to become the mighty leader in this world!

1. Groundbreaking Gameplay
A new way of growing to get rid of the boring buttons for upgrading. Instead, soldiers are absolutely under your control of promotion! Two soldiers of the same levels and types can be used to promote more advanced ones!

2. Strategic Tower Defense
Defense can be arranged based on the different features of soldiers to defend the enemy. Different defense formation always gives you surprises.

Let your name engraved on this brutal continent! Become the ultimate king of this new era!
descriptionShort: Win the throne in this continent! Join us to conquer the nations as a King!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1.0.105 Version Update
1. Modify the drop rate of the Supreme chest, and increase the probability of EPIC hero from 15% to 100%
2. Modify the drop rate of premium recruiting , ten consecutive games will get an EPIC hero
3. Reduce the golds obtained offline
4. The hero's star rise is divided into stages, and the star will be upgraded after the stage is full.
5. Improve the output of some activities
6. Increases the number of Stones, Perfect Heroes, and Advanced Chests

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
[Function]
1. VIP system: Provides powerful buffs, and a new powerful legendary hero: Ralph
2. Dragon system: the Battle Skill function is deleted. The power is transferred from Battle Skill to the Dragon, and the battle skill items will be transformed into dragon stone
3. Allies and R4 members can remind Allies to go online

[optimization]

2. Optimized the app notification messages

title: Kingdom Guard

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Titans invaded the world, guardian dragon is on the verge of extinction.
You found the last dragon egg.
Titan is rushing towards you with his dark legion.
Come on, train and merge your soldiers ,guard the dragon to save the kingdom!

1. Merge to upgrade
A new way of growing to get rid of the boring buttons for upgrading. Instead, soldiers are absolutely under your control of promotion! Two soldiers can be merge to advanced ones!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend the enemy. Different defense formation always gives you surprises.
3. Strategy Sandbox
Join the alliance, join your allies, defeat other players, and become the king of the region
Let your name engraved on this brutal continent! Become the ultimate king of this new area!
descriptionShort: Merge soldiers, recruit heroes, guard the dragon to save the Kingdom!

title: Kingdom Guard

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come on, train and merge your soldiers , protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A new way of growing to get rid of the boring buttons for upgrading. Instead, soldiers are absolutely under your control of promotion! Two soldiers can be merge to advanced ones!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend the enemy. Different defense formation always gives you surprises.

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join the alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!
descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!
title: Kingdom Guard

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!

descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1.0.149 Version Update

1. Add Turkish and Vietnamese.
2. Enhance VIP privileges substantially.
3. Now players can merge low-tier soldier books to high-tier soldier books with one-click.
4. Fix the problem that incorrect calculation of alliance challenge points.
5. Fix the problem that can't purchase golds.

title: Kingdom Guard

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!
descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
[Content Updates]
1、Server vs Server: Extreme Power & Extreme Stages
2、New event: Lucky Strike
3、New scene: Halloween Scene

[Coming Up]
1、The first SvS event will be opened on Friday, the first event will only be open between servers that have been open for more than 50 days.
2、The new Throne War is under hot preparation.

title: Kingdom Guard

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!

Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!
descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Optimizations on Broken Land
After the first round of matching on Broken Land, we carefully read all relevant suggestions from gamers and have made adjustments and optimizations accordingly in the new event:
- Changed rules for occupying Fortresses: changed from occupying consecutively to occupying accumulatively;
- Added Fortress battle intel;
- Added the Territory Overview feature;
- Optimized map march route.
More optimizations about Broken Land are being actively developed. Stay tuned.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Round 2 Broken Land Optimizations

Thank you for your support and feedback.

- Added War Supply feature: During the Broken Land event, after using Power Recovery items, the system will regularly return this item in a 20% to 50% ratio.
- Free Server-transfer: Due to the Broken Land's matching time, the free server-transfer time is adjusted to Monday through Friday during the interval, and paid transfers are restored on Saturday and Sunday.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!
descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Broken Land Round 3 - Optimizations
The third round of Broken Land battles is coming to a close - thank you for your continued support and feedback! Below are new optimizations to this feature:
- Improved matching algorithms for better matching results in the next round.
- Broken Land Achievements coming soon.
- Lv. 1 Mountain Passes now unlock in two stages: those on your server unlock in the first week; those of other servers can be invaded after two weeks.

title: Kingdom Guard:Tower Defense TD

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!
descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!

A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!
descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!

descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Announcement

- New holiday event: Ancient Egypt Treasure Hunt
- Optimization: If a player's castle carrying an artifact is knocked out (but not captured), and the player is offline for 48 hours, the owned artifact will be directly revoked by the system.
- Fixed and optimized the issue with Titan Rally pop-ups.
- Other minor optimizations and bug fixes.

Coming Soon

- Development of the Dragon Nest War is in progress.
- Optimization of the Lava Trial event is underway.

Kingdom Guard:Tower Defense TD
1.0.9

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!

title:
Kingdom Guard:Tower Defense TD
1.0.137

creator: tap4fun
descriptionHtml:
Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!
descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!

Titan has invaded our kingdom, and our guardian dragons have all but disappeared.

Finally, you discovered the fabled, last dragon egg, just as Titan descends upon you with his dark legions.

Come train and merge your soldiers, and protect the dragon egg to save the world!

1. Merge to upgrade
A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!
descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!

A brand new way of upgrading that doesn't involve boring city building and troop production. Now you have total control over your units! Merge two units of the same level and type to create a higher level unit!

2. Tower Defense
Train and merge your soldiers to defend against the enemy. Different defense formations will always yield distinct and surprising results!

3. Strategy Sandbox Game
Join an alliance, take over the dark throne, revive the guardian dragon, and achieve glory in this brutal world. Let your name live by becoming the ultimate ruler of the new age!
descriptionShort: Merge Soldiers, Recruit Heroes! Protect Dragon Eggs and Defend Your Kingdom!
